document.full_text: minnesota timberwolves forward kevin love has been voted the nba's most improved player for the season after leading the league in rebounding, the nba said on thursday.
document.title: timberwolves' love voted league's most improved player
lines_and_colors: minnesota timberwolves forward kevin love has been voted the nba's most improved player for the season after leading the league in rebounding, the nba said on thursday.
